definition: monstre sacré (i.e. artist famous for being deliberately preposterous)

sentences.english: By the end of the story, the Grinch becomes a kind person.
sentences.chinese: 到了故事的結尾，聖誕怪傑變成一個善良的人。

sentences.english: Here is a song from How the Grinch Stole Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 接下來這首歌是《聖誕怪傑》中的歌曲。

definition: standing above the common crowd (idiom); outstanding/excellent and unrivaled
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms

lit. three humble visits to a thatched cottage/cf famous episode in the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义 in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (the Hidden Dragon 臥龍|卧龙) to his cause by visiting him three times
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
